### Step 1 
##### Please Select **Sequences preprocessing** on the top bar.
<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p1_1.png" width="70%" />

***

### Step 2 
##### Select **1. Sequences summary**
In this step, we will summarize the sequences.

<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p1_2.png" width="80%" />
</br>

***

### Step 3 
##### Select the directory containing the sequences files.

<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p1_3.png" width="80%" />
<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p1_4.png" width="80%" />


##### Check your sequences type (single end or paired end).
<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p1_5.png" width="80%" />

##### Check this if yours sequences are primer-trimmed reads.
<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p1_6.png" width="80%" />

##### Choose primers. 
<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p1_7.png" width="70%" />

##### Give the threads.
<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p1_8.png" width="70%" />

***

### Step 4
##### Click on the button **"Start!"**

<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p1_9.png" width="80%" />
<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p1_10.png" width="80%" />
<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p1_11.png" width="80%" />

***

### Step 5
##### Click on the button **"View!"** to inspect the result.



##### If you want to know what the result looks like, you can click on the button **"Example for single end"** or **"Example for paired end"**.

<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p1_12.png" width="70%" />
